title: Adobe Universal Patcher v1.1 [CC 2014]
description:
Adobe Universal Patcher for CC 2014

Here comes the next version of the awesome tool created by PainteR. Last version 1.06 had the ability to crack almost all the products of CC & CS Suites, but unfortunately did not work for the latest CC 2014 release done by Adobe. But this new version 1.1 released by PainteR works for the latest CC 2014 too.

Anyway this is only for Windows users.Mac users will still have to use XFORCE keygen to activate Adobe products.This patch works for almost all the products of Adobe CC 2014 Releases

How to Install and use Patch ? (taking Photoshop CC 2014 as example)

1. Download the setup of CC 2014 Application
2. TURN OFF YOUR INTERNET CONNECTION (Important)
3. Run the installer. Choose Try in the first screen
4. Click Sign In in next window (Or Not Your Adobe ID, if you have already logged in your computer)
5. It will show an error, Then click Sign In later
6. Accept License Terms and Install
7. When setup finishes click Launch Now.In next window click Sign In Later
8. Now you will get a trial notification. Just click Start Trial there
9. Photoshop (or installed app) will launch now. Wait till it loads completely then close it.

~ take a break ~ :)

10. Now download and Run Adobe Universal Patcher CC 2014
11. Click Patch drop-down list and select the installed App [If your app is not listed there,scroll to the very bottom and select 'Try to patch another product with the amtlib file']
12. Now Click Patch button and browse to the installation path of Photoshop CC 2014 (or installed app)  - ex : C:Program FilesAdobeAdobe Photoshop CC 2014
13. Select amtlib.dll file and Click Open
14. Wait till patching finishes
15. Now run the given BLOCKHosts.bat file as administrator [not required.but follow if you want extra safety]
16. Now you have Full version of CC 2014 App :) You can turn on Internet !
